    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    BaseEntity
    A base entity class that provides common fields and methods for entities.
    CarController
    REST controller for managing cars.
    CarCriterionDto
    Represents a DTO (Data Transfer Object) that holds car filtering criteria.
    CarCriterionFilteringView
    A record representing the filtering criteria for cars.
    CarDto
    Data Transfer Object (DTO) representing a car.
    CarEntity
    Represents a car entity in the database.
    CarRepository
    Repository interface for CarEntity, extending the basic CRUD functionality and custom queries.
    CarRepositoryCustom
    This interface provides methods for custom queries that allow grouping of car entities based on specified fields and retrieving statistics related to the price and other fields.
    CarRepositoryCustomImpl
    Custom implementation of the CarRepositoryCustom interface.
    CarService
    Interface CarService defines the operations for managing car entities.
    CarServiceImpl
    The CarServiceImpl class implements the CarService interface and provides functionality for managing car-related operations such as saving, filtering, grouping, and sorting cars.
    CarSpecification
    Interface for dynamic filtering of car entities based on specified criteria.
    CarSpecificationImpl
    Implementation of the CarSpecification interface that provides dynamic filters for car entities.
    CarsSpringBootJpaApplication
    The CarsSpringBootJpaApplication class is the main entry point for the Spring Boot application.
    CarWithoutComponentsDto
    Data Transfer Object (DTO) representing a car without its components.
    Color
    An enumeration representing various colors.
    ComponentDto
    Data Transfer Object (DTO) for representing a component.
    ComponentEntity
    Represents a component entity in the database.
    ComponentRepository
    Repository interface for managing ComponentEntity entities.
    ComponentsAndCarsView
    A record representing a view for a component and the cars associated with it.
    ComponentsController
    REST controller for managing car components.
    ComponentService
    Interface ComponentService defines the operations for managing component entities.
    ComponentServiceImpl
    The ComponentServiceImpl class implements the ComponentService interface and provides functionality for managing car components.
    ComponentsWithCarsDto
    Data Transfer Object (DTO) for representing a component with associated cars.
    CreateCarDto
    Data Transfer Object (DTO) used for creating a car.
    CreateCarDtoValidator
    CreateCarDtoValidator is a component responsible for validating the data of a CreateCarDto.
    CreateComponentDto
    Data Transfer Object (DTO) for creating a component.
    CreateComponentDtoValidator
    CreateComponentDtoValidator is a component responsible for validating the data of a CreateComponentDto.
    CrudRepository<T,U>
    A custom repository interface that extends JpaRepository and provides the basic CRUD operations for managing entities.
    CrudService<T,U>
    The CrudService interface provides the basic CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations for any entity type T with the identifier type U.
    CrudServiceGeneric<T,U>
    A generic service implementation for CRUD operations, providing common functionality for managing entities.
    GlobalExceptionHandler
    Global exception handler that handles various types of exceptions and returns appropriate HTTP responses.
    GroupByAndPriceStatisticDto<T>
    Data Transfer Object (DTO) used for grouping and calculating price statistics.
    GroupByAndPriceStatisticView<T>
    A record representing a view that groups entities by a certain field and provides price statistics such as the minimum and maximum price for each group.
    GroupByDto<T>
    Data Transfer Object (DTO) used for grouping elements by a specific parameter.
    GroupByView<T>
    A record representing a view that groups entities by a certain field and provides the count (amount) of entities in each group.
    ParameterCarValidator
    ParameterCarValidator is a component responsible for validating the given parameter name.
    PriceSpeedStatisticDto
    Data Transfer Object (DTO) for holding price and speed statistics of cars.
    PriceSpeedStatisticView
    A record representing the statistical information of cars, specifically related to price and speed.
    ResponseDto<T>
    A generic DTO class used to represent a response, containing either a data payload or an error message.
    Validator<T>
    The Validator interface defines a contract for classes that perform validation on a given object.
